title: Riot Please..
body: So me and my friend were playing our flex ranks for the placements and you know last season he got bronze 4 and i got bronze 3 almost 2... He finishes his placement with 3 wins and 7 loses AND GETS SILVER 4 (WTF!) Im ok cool maybe ill get even better. so i get 4 wins and 6 loses. I GET BRONZE 5. Like seriously i want to speak to someone that can help me with this stupid way of placement on how tf i get bronze 5 with 4 wins and he gets silver 4 WITH 3 wins....

replies.body:
This is just the preseason, so placements aren't for the 2017 ranked season. I agree with *chocolate* that there are a few more factors that determine where you place other than just wins/losses. Your overall MMR and what you were last season also slightly impact where you place in the preseason.

You can find out details about the 2017 Ranked season [here.](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/competitive/how-rank-2017-season) Let me know if you have any questions.
I won the first 3 games of my placement games and won the last 1 on the last game for placement

Did you play all of the games together? Because the first few games of placements matter a lot more than the last few, so if he won 3 then lost 7 and you lost 6 then won 4, he would probably do better than you in placements. Idk about getting a tier higher but still he should get higher if that happens
